body: This should be changed to respect our forward compatibility rules. Use the forward compatibility layer to make this change, with the date set 3 weeks in the future of the merge (so a month from now is safe): https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/compat/compat.py
